record.field: # Available variables: # - env: Odoo Environment on which the action is triggered # - model: Odoo Model of the record on which the action is triggered; is a void recordset # - record: record on which the action is triggered; may be void # - records: recordset of all records on which the action is triggered in multi-mode; may be void # - time, datetime, dateutil, timezone: useful Python libraries # - log: log(message, level='info'): logging function to record debug information in ir.logging table # - UserError: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...} if (record['city']): record['city'] = record['city'].proper()

# Available variables: # - env: Odoo Environment on which the action is triggered # - model: Odoo Model of the record on which the action is triggered; is a void recordset # - record: record on which the action is triggered; may be void # - records: recordset of all records on which the action is triggered in multi-mode; may be void # - time, datetime, dateutil, timezone: useful Python libraries # - log: log(message, level='info'): logging function to record debug information in ir.logging table # - UserError: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...} if (record['city']): record['city'] = record['city'].title()

# Available variables: # - env: Odoo Environment on which the action is triggered # - model: Odoo Model of the record on which the action is triggered; is a void recordset # - record: record on which the action is triggered; may be void # - records: recordset of all records on which the action is triggered in multi-mode; may be void # - time, datetime, dateutil, timezone: useful Python libraries # - log: log(message, level='info'): logging function to record debug information in ir.logging table # - UserError: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...} if (record['partner_id']): record['partner_id'] = record['partner_id'].upper()

# Available variables: # - env: Odoo Environment on which the action is triggered # - model: Odoo Model of the record on which the action is triggered; is a void recordset # - record: record on which the action is triggered; may be void # - records: recordset of all records on which the action is triggered in multi-mode; may be void # - time, datetime, dateutil, timezone: useful Python libraries # - log: log(message, level='info'): logging function to record debug information in ir.logging table # - UserError: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...} if (record['partner_name']): record['partner_name'] = record['partner_name'].upper()

# Available variables: # - env: Odoo Environment on which the action is triggered # - model: Odoo Model of the record on which the action is triggered; is a void recordset # - record: record on which the action is triggered; may be void # - records: recordset of all records on which the action is triggered in multi-mode; may be void # - time, datetime, dateutil, timezone: useful Python libraries # - log: log(message, level='info'): logging function to record debug information in ir.logging table # - UserError: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...} self = self.upper()
